ClinicalDocument.title: Good Health Clinic Continuity of Care Document

item.content:
Medication: Albuterol inhalant
Instructions: 2 puffs QID PRN wheezing
Status: Active

Medication: Clopidogrel (Plavix)
Instructions: 75mg PO daily
Status: Active

Medication: Metoprolol
Instructions: 25mg PO BID
Status: Active

Medication: Prednisone
Instructions: 20mg PO daily
Start Date: Mar 28, 2000
Status: Active

Medication: Cephalexin (Keflex)
Instructions: 500mg PO QID x 7 days (for bronchitis)
Start Date: Mar 28, 2000
Status: No longer active

td.content: CEREBRAL ARTERY OCCLUSION, UNSPECIFIED, WITH CEREBRAL INFARCTION

translation.displayName: CEREBRAL ARTERY OCCLUSION, UNSPECIFIED, WITH CEREBRAL INFARCTION

td.content: 75 mg = 1 tab(s), PO, Once Daily, 30 tab(s)
5 mg = 1 tab(s), PO, Once Daily, 30 tab(s)
30 mg = 1 tab(s), PO, Once Daily, 30 tab(s)
